about_the_game:
A special pack designed with all players in mind, the Long Drive Bundle is exactly as the name says! With an upgraded driver created with for maximum distance and forgiveness, and premium golf balls to slow down your swing meter, this 6X value pack is sure to jumpstart your game.

The Long Drive Bundle includes:

Titleist TSr2 Driver (L0+) - A solid tee shot can make or break your round. This premium driver will improve your overall distance and forgiveness, making each swing even more fun.

6x Titleist Pro V1x Ultra Slow Meter Vapor Balls (L0+) - Ideal for golfers at all levels, use these player-favorite virtual balls to slow down your swing meter and add more distance. Plus, the added vapor trail makes each shot easier to track.

2,000 WGT Credits - Visit the Pro Shop to find more premium virtual golf equipment, because upgraded equipment is one of the best ways to maximize your time on the course.

100,000 Coins - Test your skills in multiplayer games or rent special clubs in the Pro Shop. Renting clubs is a great way to find what best suits your playing style before you make a purchase.

5x Platinum Apparel Packs - Add swag to your game with unique apparel. Each pack features new items that you can use to enhance your avatar’s appearance and performance.

Immediately unlock all courses – Experience every WGT course available, right now

Items are delivered directly to your in-game inbox for you to collect and start using.

If purchased separately, the full price of these items would total $125.

Offer available for PC and Mac only, note that not all courses are available in full stroke play or in all game modes. Refunds not available if you already own clubs included in this pack.
